panels.description: The phase value for the current epoch. The phase can be one of 1-Staking, 2-Setup, 3-Committed. Each epoch transitions through phases like 1->2->3.
panels.title: Epoch Phase

panels.description: The counter value for the current epoch. The counter is incremented after each epoch transition, including during sporks.
panels.title: Epoch Counter

panels.description: Tracks the approximate number of hours remaining until the next epoch switchover. (Denominator in query is average views/hour)
panels.title: Epoch Timing

panels.description: The average result approval rate of verification nodes
panels.title: Verification Result Approval Rate

panels.description: The average rate of incoming assigned chunks for verification nodes.
panels.title: Verification Assigned Chunks Rate

panels.description: The average rate of requester engine on dispatching chunk data pack requests to execution nodes and receiving the chunk data response from the execution nodes.
panels.title: Chunk Data Pack Request/Reply Rate

panels.description: Average mempool sizes of verification nodes
panels.title: Verification Mempool Size

panels.description: Average lookup duration over the nodes
panels.title: Average DNS Lookup Duration
Network Queue Size on Execution Nodes
Network Queue Size on Consensus Nodes

targets.expr:
(avg by (role) (rate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{network="$network", role!="loader", role!="tracing"}[5m]))) 
/ 
(avg by (role) (rate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{network="$network", role!="loader", role!="tracing"}[5m])))
